item.title:
The AVA 2022 Aftermovie is here 🎞
Titanic Slipways hosted a stacked roster; with more locals and live acts than ever before alongside international talent.
Heading to the link in our below to sign up for all the latest info and early access for #AVA2023 https://avafestival.com/ava-2023-sign-up/
item.dc:creator: @AVAFestivalNI

item.title:
LIVE music took things up a notch at AVA this year 🎤 🔥
Feat. @mura_masa_, @BiigPiigMusic, @piri_io_ & @VilliersTommy, @NewDad, @monjolaaa ++
A new level of production added different energies, sounds and soul to our four festival stages & and we absolutely loved it 🔆
item.dc:creator: @AVAFestivalNI
item.description:
LIVE music took things up a notch at AVA this year 🎤 🔥

Feat. @mura_masa_, @BiigPiigMusic, @piri_io_ & @VilliersTommy, @NewDad, @monjolaaa ++

A new level of production added different energies, sounds and soul to our four festival stages & and we absolutely loved it 🔆

item.title: RT by @AVAFestivalNI: A weekend I’ll never forget💘I’m so grateful to be surrounded by the best people in the world and to be given all these amazing opportunities. My heart is full🥰. Huge love to @AVAFestivalNI for always believing in me from day 1! My boiler room will be back online very soon x
item.dc:creator: @darttrax
item.description: A weekend I’ll never forget💘I’m so grateful to be surrounded by the best people in the world and to be given all these amazing opportunities. My heart is full🥰. Huge love to @AVAFestivalNI for always believing in me from day 1! My boiler room will be back online very soon x

item.title:
RT by @AVAFestivalNI: I haven’t shut up about it, but I am gutted @AVAFestivalNI is over. The music, the weather, the setting and the company.
Unbelievable festival stacked with homegrown talent. Roll on 2023
item.dc:creator: @GRRD_Bekuz
item.description:
I haven’t shut up about it, but I am gutted @AVAFestivalNI is over. The music, the weather, the setting and the company.

Unbelievable festival stacked with homegrown talent. Roll on 2023

item.title:
RT by @AVAFestivalNI: Looking at videos from @AVAFestivalNI got me in the feels 🥲
Irish Crew ain’t fucking about and really know how to party… the energy looks unmatched. I need to get out there ASAP man - promoters holla y’a boy yeah🥹🪩
item.dc:creator: @Dr_Dubplate
item.description:
Looking at videos from @AVAFestivalNI got me in the feels 🥲

Irish Crew ain’t fucking about and really know how to party… the energy looks unmatched. I need to get out there ASAP man - promoters holla y’a boy yeah🥹🪩

item.title: RT by @AVAFestivalNI: Spent some time at @AVAFestivalNI last weekend – was brilliant to see so much creative output for our little city. Special props to @FreeTheNightNI – merch was everywhere. Specifically in our fav Matheson's Boiler Room; https://youtu.be/rMY3UwXlMRs
item.dc:creator: @hundredstudio_
item.description: Spent some time at @AVAFestivalNI last weekend – was brilliant to see so much creative output for our little city. Special props to @FreeTheNightNI – merch was everywhere. Specifically in our fav Matheson's Boiler Room; invidious.fdn.fr/rMY3UwXlMRs
